meanings.definition: The measurement from base to top.
meanings.sent1: The height of the tree is impressive.
meanings.sent2: She reached the height of her career last year.
meanings.sent3: The height of the cake was so tall, it almost touched the ceiling.
meanings.sent4: His ambition reached new heights after winning the competition.
meanings.sent5: The mountain's height made it challenging to climb.

meanings.sent1: The height of the mountain was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: She reached the height of her excitement when she won the prize.
meanings.sent3: The height of his jump on the trampoline surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her intelligence reached new heights with each book she read.
meanings.sent5: The height of the roller coaster made her scream with joy.

meanings.definition: The distance from the bottom to the top.
meanings.sent1: The height of the building was remarkable.
meanings.sent2: The balloon reached the height of the clouds.
meanings.sent3: The height of the water fountain sprayed water everywhere.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work reached new heights this year.
meanings.sent5: The height of the waves crashing against the shore was mesmerizing.
